# Overview

RNA-seq count data from Pickrell et al. (2010) employed to illustrate the use of the 
Poisson-Tweedie family of distributions with the tweeDEseq package.


For more information in how loading and use of the data, please, refer to [`tweeDEseqCountData` vignette](https://github.com/isglobal-brge/tweeDEseqCountData)
